name: Marsico International Opportunities
description: The fund invests primarily in foreign securities, such as common stocks of foreign companies that are selected for their long-term growth potential and other foreign securities, whether traded in the U.S. or in foreign markets or both. The investment adviser seeks to select stocks of high-quality companies with compelling long-term capital appreciation potential. The fundamental investment approach combines "top-down" macro-economic analysis and investment theme development with "bottom-up" company and security analysis to identify attractive opportunities.
